record.dc:title: Baseball game, Gatlinburg versus Murphy College from Sevierville We Beat!
record.dc:description: The photographer is standing west of the six-room schoolhouse (ca. 1914) looking northeast. Note Squire Maples home just above the seated players, and the Mountain View Hotel off in the distance just to the left of the Grandstand.
